title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 431.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 431.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

Treatment centers and diagnostic centers shall comply
with the standards for such centers set forth in the State Hospital Code, Subchapter C of this Chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
431.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
